nodes.text: Dobbs was a Human male stormtrooper who served in the Imperial Military during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 BBY, he was assigned aboard the Star Destroyer Imperator where he served in the platoon assigned to Cadet leader Kyle Katarn.

Once the assault boat landed, Dobbs was assigned as a scout of his squad to check the area; he cursed his luck as this made him exposed, but he reported that he found nothing. He was killed during the battle on AX-456.
